VectorBucketName.description: The name of the vector bucket.
VectorBucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the vector bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption

VectorBucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vector bucket.
VectorBucketArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vector bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: Date and time when the vector bucket was created.
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
Date and time when the vector bucket was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.description: The encryption configuration for the vector bucket.

SseType.description: The server-side encryption type to use for the encryption configuration of the vector bucket. By default, if you don't specify, all new vectors in Amazon S3 vector buckets use server-side encryption with Amazon S3 managed keys (SSE-S3), specifically AES256.
SseType.markdownDescription:
The server-side encryption type to use for the encryption configuration of the vector bucket. By default, if you don't specify, all new vectors in Amazon S3 vector buckets use server-side encryption with Amazon S3 managed keys (SSE-S3), specifically AES256.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AES256 | aws:kms  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: AWS Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key ID to use for the encryption configuration. This parameter is allowed if and only if sseType is set to aws:kms
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
AWS Key Management Service (KMS) customer managed key ID to use for the encryption configuration. This parameter is allowed if and only if sseType is set to aws:kms

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:kms:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:key/.+)$  
Update requires: No interruption

EncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
The encryption configuration for the vector bucket.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption
